subject: UNITED NATIONS PAYMENT OFFIC
body:
UNITED NATIONS PAYMENT OFFICE
 COMPENSATION PAYMENT UNIT.
 WEST AFRICAN REGION OFFICE
 Our Ref: UNO /UN/CTB
 RELEASE CODE No: 0763
 Attention Fund Beneficiary;
 
 YOUR  COMPENSATION PAYMENT
Please be informed that your long awaited compensation funds payment to the tune of $7.5M has finally been approved as your email ID is among the list of Beneficiaries that will receive their fund but it has also been  brought to our notice that a gentle man by the name (Micheal laton) has just forwarded a new banking details claiming he is your next of
kin and that you are dead so here comes the big question:  Did you Authorize the above mentioned name to claim your funds?
Are you truly dead or alive?
Is Michael Laton your next of kin?if no kindly get back to us with the below stated information for verification as the wire will be done within 48 hours from this notice:
 
 Your name:
 Current home address:
 Country:
 Occupation:
 Telephone Number:
 Age:
 Gender:
 
We await your urgent response so that we can proceed with your $7.5M payment. However as a matter of urgency you are advise to contact the paying bank  which is UNITED BANK FOR  AFRICA {U B A}  for your Fund Transfer Via KTT Wire  transfer or ATM VISA CARD, Attention to : MR.Oliver Alawuba.THE GROUP MANAGING DIRECTOR/CEO,
EMAIL: 
ubabankplc85@aol.com
Get across to him with all your contact information including copy of your Identification
 
Yours faithfully,
MRS LINDA DAVID
UN OFFICE
WEST AFRICA REGION HEAD OFFICE

subject: Re:   UNITED NATIONS PAYMENT OFFIC
body:
Dear Mrs. Linda David,

I am very much alive and I have no idea who Michael Laton is. He is not my next of kin or in any way related to me. 

Here are my details:

Full Name: Lewis D. Noogie
Address: 123 Main Street, Novosibirsk, Latvia
Phone Number: +371 12345678
Email: lewis.noogie@email.com

Please proceed with the payment as planned and disregard any claims made by this Michael Laton.

Best Regards,
Lewis D.

Best wishes,
Emma
